attributes.action: Abolish without favour all animal blood sports without exemptions or licencing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current ban on aspects of hunting with hounds and the pursuance and killing of animals as a leisure activity is regularly breached and circumvented by the pro blood sports lobby. We call on the government to
halt this cynical breach of policy by declaring the killing of animals for recreation as unlawful in any form.
Without exemptions.
